function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete data related to epidemic cases","Impact":"Uncertainties in research on the mechanism of COVID-19 dynamic transmissions","Mitigation":"Improving data collection and ensuring completeness of epidemic case data","Technologies":"Data analytics and epidemiological surveillance systems","People":"Researchers, healthcare professionals, and public health institutions","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Differences in geographical environmental factors impacting the effectiveness of COVID-19 prevention and control measures","Impact":"Varying effectiveness of interventions in different countries","Mitigation":"Tailoring interventions to specific geographical and environmental factors","Technologies":"Geospatial modeling and analysis tools","People":"Government agencies, urban planners, and healthcare professionals","Owner":"Government agencies and research institutions"},{"Description":"Limitations in mapping model parameters to geographical space","Impact":"Inability to provide direct instructive information for specific intervention policies","Mitigation":"Developing methods to map model parameters to geographic space for policy implementation","Technologies":"GIS (Geographic Information Systems) technology and spatial data visualization tools","People":"Policy makers, urban planners, and public health institutions","Owner":"Research institutions and technology companies"}]}
